       <div id="wrapbox16808710">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16808710">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16808710">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16808710">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>

     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16808711">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16808711">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16808711">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative Reference Works (Tertiary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16808711">
          <div id="boxatt16808711" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19846121">
              <a id="link_19846121" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846121,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846198">
              Encyclopedia of Christianity
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Definitive reference work on Christianity. Multivolume set. Available in Trexler Library, call # 230.003 E56o
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846161">
              <a id="link_19846161" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://literati.credoreference.com/content/title/brilljud" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846161,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19846161}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Judaism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides a full and reliable account of Judaism, beginning in ancient Israelite times and extending to our own day. Published in collaboration with the Museum of Jewish Heritage, New York.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846182">
              <a id="link_19846182" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://literati.credoreference.com/content/title/routprotestant" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846182,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19846182}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Protestantism
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive reference to the history and beliefs that continue to exert a profound influence on Western thought. Featuring entries written by an international team of specialists and scholars, the encyclopedia traces the course of Protestantism from its beginnings prior to 1517, when Martin Luther nailed his 95 Theses to the door of Wittenberg Cathedral, to the vital and diverse international scene of the present day.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846112">
              <a id="link_19846112" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5BSX" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846112,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12716850}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The second edition of a resource that is considered a standard reference in the field. Presents a cross-cultural approach that emphasizes religion's role within everyday life and as a unique experience from culture to culture. The original 2,750 entries have been retained, many heavily updated, and approximately 600 entirely new articles have been added by an international team of scholars and contributors.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16808712">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16808712">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16808712">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Books (Primary or Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16808712">
          <div id="boxatt16808712" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19846218">
              <a id="link_19846218" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846215">
              <a id="link_19846215" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846215,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12464693}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16808713">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16808713">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16808713">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Journal Articles (Secondary)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16808713">
          <div id="boxatt16808713" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19846240">
              <a id="link_19846240" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846225">
              <a id="link_19846225" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=reh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846225,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12465744}); ">
               ATLA Religion
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to research literature in world religions and related studies, with many links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846230">
              <a id="link_19846230" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=jph" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846230,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767659}); ">
               Index to Jewish Periodicals
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Comprehensive index to English-language articles from journals devoted to Jewish affairs.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19846248">
              <a id="link_19846248" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19846248,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16816658">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16816658">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16816658">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Websites as Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16816658">
          <div id="boxatt16816658" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19855144">
              <a id="link_19855144" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19855144,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855144}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Blogs and other opinion-based websites can function as primary source material to gauge contemporary attitudes about a particular concept. In addition, statistical websites can serve as a source for primary documentation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile4574732" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox16808717">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16808717">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16808717">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content16808717">
          <div id="boxatt16808717" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link19845365">
              <a id="link_19845365" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19845365,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19845365}); ">
               Trexler Library Citation Guides
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Brief, easy-to-use guides to the 3 most used citation styles: APA, Chicago (Turabian), MLA.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link19845366">
              <a id="link_19845366" href="http://www.zotero.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(19845366,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Jews and Christians in the 21st Century', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19845366}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free citation tool. Does the citing for you! Loved by librarians, professors, and students alike.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox16817162">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="16817162">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title16817162">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16817162">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt16817162" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
